**2022-07-13 / @rsc, @ianlancetaylor, @bradfitz**

**Accepted**

- **crypto/subtle: add XORBytes** [#53021](https://golang.org/issue/53021)
  - no change in consensus; **accepted** üéâ
- **encoding/xml: Add (\*Encoder).Close() to check for unclosed elements** [#53346](https://golang.org/issue/53346)
  - no change in consensus; **accepted** üéâ
- **go/token: add FileSet.RemoveFile method** [#53200](https://golang.org/issue/53200)
  - no change in consensus; **accepted** üéâ
- **text/template: add "return" action** [#53015](https://golang.org/issue/53015)
  - no change in consensus; **accepted** üéâ
- **x/crypto/cryptobyte: add ReadUint64 and AddUint64** [#53481](https://golang.org/issue/53481)
  - no change in consensus; **accepted** üéâ

**Declined**

- **bytes: add Buffer.Init** [#53443](https://golang.org/issue/53443)
  - no change in consensus; **declined**
- **cmd/objdump: add '-gnu-only' or '-mca' flag** [#52099](https://golang.org/issue/52099)
  - no change in consensus; **declined**
- **net/netip: add netip.Prefix.Range** [#53236](https://golang.org/issue/53236)
  - no change in consensus; **declined**
- **strings: add StripSlashes like PHP stripslashes** [#43579](https://golang.org/issue/43579)
  - no change in consensus; **declined**

**Likely Accept**

- **all: add freebsd/riscv64 port** [#53466](https://golang.org/issue/53466)
  - **likely accept**; last call for comments ‚è≥

  - **likely accept**; last call for comments ‚è≥

  - **likely accept**; last call for comments ‚è≥
- **net: add FlagRunning to the Flags of struct Interface, to exactly reflect the states of an interface or NIC** [#53482](https://golang.org/issue/53482)
  - **likely accept**; last call for comments ‚è≥
- **testing: add Elapsed() method to testing.B** [#43620](https://golang.org/issue/43620)
  - **likely accept**; last call for comments ‚è≥
- **testing: report GC/op when b.ReportAllocs is called** [#52466](https://golang.org/issue/52466)
  - **likely accept**; last call for comments ‚è≥

- **strconv: add ParseFloatPrefix** [#53340](https://golang.org/issue/53340)
  - **likely decline**; last call for comments ‚è≥

  - **likely decline**; last call for comments ‚è≥
- **x/net/webdav: make webdav/internal/xml module public** [#53527](https://golang.org/issue/53527)
